channel.title: EDDBUD
channel.description:
Welcome and thanks for visiting my channel. My name is Eddbud and I am a non elite runner from the South West of England. You will find a host of shoe and running gear reviews along with video logs of running events here on my channel.
Subscriber count of 1000 as of 26/9/19
Subscriber count of 10,000 as of 10/2020
Subscriber count of 25,000 as of 1/2022
Join this channel to get access to perks: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8Pnc_D6UQfr1hvPtLZLvjw/join
Email me at eddbudshoetube@gmail.com
Follow me on Strava https://www.strava.com/athletes/30448518
Follow me on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/eddbud/
Buy Channel Merch at Teespring https://teespring.com/en-GB/stores/eddbudstore

item.description:
#VIMAZI #VIMAZIZ40 #Z40 #EDDBUD #RUNNINGSHOES
VIMAZI Z40 INITIAL REVIEW - NEW PACE TUNED RUNNING SHOE MODEL FOR 2023 - EDDBUD
An initial review of the new VIMAZI Z40, a brand new company and a new shoe lineup which feature pace tuned midsoles.
A shoe fired over to me by vimazi for review, but they are not paying me to make this video and wont be vetting my video before my valued viewers.
A more responsive pace shoe this one, forget overt squash, this is all about turnover and the right cushion to create an engaging ride underfoot.
Sadly only available in the US right now, but i hear there are more ways to buy the shoes coming soon. I recommend going a half size up on this model.
https://vimazi.com/products/mens-z40
I comment on the upper, midsole and outsole after my initial runs. Let me know your thoughts and opinions down in the comments.
Join this channel to get access to perks: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8Pnc_D6UQfr1hvPtLZLvjw/join
Hold tight people, stay strong and we WILL make it through.
Keep it nice in the comments please, i do not do unpleasant, its just ..... unpleasant. See you in the digital ones and zeros......
Subscriber count as of 7/4/2023 38365 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Email me at: eddbudshoetube@gmail.com
Follow me on Strava: https://www.strava.com/athletes/30448518
Follow me on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/eddbud/
Join the EDDBUD Runners United strava group at the link below. https://www.strava.com/clubs/EDDBUDRUNNERSUNITED
Please like, share, comment and subscribe. We are building a great community here, and it is down to you the viewers.
item.title: VIMAZI Z40 INITIAL REVIEW - NEW PACE TUNED RUNNING SHOE MODEL FOR 2023 - EDDBUD

item.description:
EDDBUD RUNNING NEWS EPISODE 75 - BOSTON MARATHON plus NEW SHOE RELEASES
NIKE ZOOM AIR PEGASUS 40 REEBOK FLOATRIDE ENERGY SHIELD SYSTEM ASICS CUMULUS 25
As always, interesting developments in the world of running!
Today i take a look at some select running shoe releases in April of 2023, along with some strange interesting articles surrounding runners foot-strike.
I take a look at the weather for the Boston marathon which is coming up in April of 2023. Also i speculate on why we havent seen a total copy as of yet of that nike vaporfly next% design. I reckon its down to patents!
Hold tight people, stay strong and we WILL make it through.
Keep it nice in the comments please, i do not do unpleasant, its just ..... unpleasant. See you in the digital ones and zeros......
Subscriber count as of 10/4/2023 38459 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

item.description:
#HOKA #ROCKETX2 #HOKA2023 #EDDBUD #RUNNINGSHOES
HOKA ROCKET X 2 - BEST NEW CARBON PLATE MODEL OF 2023? - EDDBUD
An initial review of the new HOKA ROCKET X 2, a brand new version of the previous lower price carbon plate model from a couple of years back though in truth a new shoe almost entirely.
A shoe bought after a viewer poll suggested itâ€™s one you all want to see. The best Hoka shoe I have reviewed thus far on the channel. Also managed to grab this one at a 25% discount from sportshoes.com
I comment on the upper, midsole and outsole after my initial runs. Let me know your thoughts and opinions down in the comments.
